doc.name: DistributedTypedIORelation
doc.description: Extension of TypedIORelation for distributed environments. It overrides the deepReceivers method that returns the connected receivers to this relation. In this case, the relation only contains (is connected to) one DistributedReceiver in charge of forwarding tokens to the distributed services that are connected.
doc.author: Daniel Lazaro Cuadrado (kapokasa@kom.aau.dk)
